content: wrap yourself in effortless style with vanda a contemporary-style poncho crocheted using the soft shimmering textures of berroco lumi and aerial yarn worked flat in two separate pieces then sewn together at the shoulders this lightweight breathable design is perfect for spring **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 **finished measurements** back / front width 29½ 35 39¼ 45 49¾ / 75 89 99 5 114 126 5 cm length 21½ / 54 5 cm shown in size 2 35 / 89 cm **yarn** berroco lumi 50 g 9 11 12 14 18 balls #8156 snow c1 berroco aerial 25 g 5 5 6 7 8 balls #3447 thunder c2 **hook** crochet hook size i-9 / 5 5 mm *or size to obtain gauge* **notions** removable stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge** 15 sts and 11 row = 4 / 10 cm in pattern st with 1 strand of each yarn held together *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
